title: Grow More Give More: Raised Bed Soil Test

tasks.task: Taking a soil sample for a raised bed garden
subtasks: Gather necessary materials (container, trowel, ziplock bag, soil sample form)
Use a trowel to extract soil samples from multiple locations in the raised bed at approximately four inches depth
Combine extracted soil samples into a single container, mixing them thoroughly
Transfer the mixed soil into a ziplock bag, filling it to about halfway
Seal the ziplock bag and place it into the soil sample box
Fill out the soil sample form with sender's information, raised bed name, crop type, and field details
Indicate the square footage of the raised bed on the form
